newsitem.title: ROMANIA: RADIO ROMANIA AFTERNOON HEADLINES AT 1 PM.
newsitem.headline: RADIO ROMANIA AFTERNOON HEADLINES AT 1 PM.

text.p: * Several Romanian rivers threatened to flood following heavy rainfalls over the past days.
Road traffic between the mountain resort of Predeal and the city of Brasov is blocked by snow.

* Lockhead Martin of the United States is interested in investing in Romania, said Lockhead chairman Norman Augustine at the end of his visit to Bucharest. He also said that the company intends to open an office in Romania. -- Bucharest Newsroom 40-1 3120264
